name: Click images in Cursor Markdown previews across two files
description: In Cursor, click an image element in the Markdown Preview of one file, then click an image element in the Markdown Preview of another file. Useful for inspecting or comparing images embedded across files.

parameters.name: file_name_step_1
parameters.description: Markdown file name (or path) whose Preview contains the image to click in step 1 (e.g., 20260219_定例MT_進行台本.md).

parameters.name: workspace_step_1
parameters.description: Workspace/project name shown in the window title for step 1 (e.g., movico).

parameters.name: file_name_step_2
parameters.description: Markdown file name (or path) whose Preview contains the image to click in step 2 (e.g., tools.md).

parameters.name: workspace_step_2
parameters.description: Workspace/project name shown in the window title for step 2 (e.g., 8891_screen_shot).
